desc: We believe that we're stronger together and sometimes we just need to get together and talk about the things that really matter. I am H.E.R. is a non-profit organization with the goal to unite female identifying youth and encourage them to be HOPEFUL, to know they are fully qualified and EQUIPPED to chase their dreams.

layout.text: Love Your Body & The Soul Within
A workshop with the aim to engage girls in conversation around positive thinking, body insecurity, and to provide tangible tools to help increase body image and confidence.
I Am H.E.R. x Local Barre YQR
For more information and workshop agenda, click

THANK YOU! We had such an overwhelming response to this event that we sold out all available spots within hours. Stay tuned for more workshops coming in the near future. Thank you for believing in our mission and for the continued support. You are directly helping us, help #HER by helping us build a community of girls that are HOPEFUL + EQUIPPED + RESILIENT
